name: Live Wire
description:
Catgirl Vtuber Bullet Hell!

Welcome Streamer! Theda Interactive has selected you to be one of the first few in the world to test the BUZZR! This device allows the streamer to be fully connected to their audience, and allows them to influence the streamer based on their game performance.

How to Play

User the WASD controls to move your character and avoid the enemies and their bullets! Use your mouse to click on follower notifications and rude comments to acknowledge them and gain viewer retention! The higher your viewer retention, the more likely you receive donations. Once you get $250 in donations, you win!

Screen size must be 1920x1080 or higher! (Bug will be fixed later)

Theda Interactive is not responsible for any and all injuries sustained while using the 'BUZZR!'.

Made for Chillennium Game Jam 2023

Art & Animation: Jayde Arnoult

UI Design: Jayde Arnoult, Wesley Johnston

Pixel Art: Wesley Johnston

Development/Coding: Aiden Mathews, Aalok Zimmerman

Music & Sound Effects: Aiden Mathews, Wesley Johnston

Concept & Story Development: Wesley Johnston, Jayde Arnoult
